text: 24.15: Dan 12.2; Zo 5.28-29; FG 23.6; 26.6-7; 28.20Gu nta khothɨgap, gu Fhe Bakɨme taagip mba vhɨzgi gumgi gu mbigi khavɨrgane, gu nen rarga ki. Ana tɨvir vhuuiŋ muuŋgi gumgi gu mbigi, mba tɨvi mbatɨgi ga muuŋgi gumgi gu mbigi, ana za taagi mbe khavgirga. Mbe vhɨra ne nzuav Fhe Bakɨme khothɨgap, ana rarga wari ki.
